CustomField.description: Indicates whether the insured individual qualifies for the Low-Income Subsidy (LIS) program under Medicare.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if the individual is eligible for the Low-Income Subsidy (LIS), also known as Extra Help. LIS is a Medicare program that helps eligible individuals pay for Medicare Part D prescription drug costs, including premiums, deductibles, and co-pays. Eligibility is based on income and resource levels set by the federal government.
CustomField.label: LIS
